text: unkalil evarenum manaiviyarai vittu irakkum nilaiyil irupparkalanal, tankal manaiviyarukku orantu varai (unavu, utai ponra tevaikalaik kotuttu) atarittu, (vittai vittu avarkal) veliyerrappatatapati (varicakalukku) avarkal marana cacanam kurutal ventum; anal, appenkal tankale veliye cenru muraippati tankal kariyankalaic ceytu kontarkalanal, (atil) unkal mitu kurramillai - melum allah vallamaiyutaiyavanum, arivarral utaiyonum avan
